content.question: Which of the following illustrates the effect of a decrease in an economy’s resources using a production possibilities curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, P P C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>PPC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift inward and to the left.
The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift outward and to the right.
The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will become steeper.
The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will become flatter.
The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will remain the same.

content.answer: The economy’s <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will shift inward and to the left.
